name: mossy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered with moss (= a small plant that grows in wet places): a mossy tree/rock/lawn They sat together on the mossy tree-trunk. See
moss
More examplesFewer examplesAlready the temple was a half-buried heap of mossy stones.Wild garlic grows in shady places along the banks of streams and in undisturbed mossy woodland.She fell back hard onto the green mossy ground.
